settings.title: Sign up and save
settings.text: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

We put the power of fitness in your hands: anytime, any place, and in any condition.

Our equipment has been proven to meet the most rigorous demands and tested by those who place their lives on the line everyday.

We're USA Made and made to deliver.

It’s time to train and Train Accordingly™.

settings.subtitle: Brute Force
settings.title: One Piece of Equipment for 300+ movements
settings.text: With our superior line of mini, athlete, and strongman sandbags, you've got an entire garage gym at your fingers.

settings.subtitle: MAKE IT A SYSTEM
settings.title: ADAPTIVE FILLER SYSTEM
settings.text: For the first time ever, you can now rapidly change the weight in your sandbag before or during your workout. Grab a set of our 5lbs Adaptive Fillers to meet your needs and quick go from base to max weight.

settings.subtitle: Why choose us?
settings.title: Brute Force Philosophy
settings.text:
Brute Force started with a core belief in functional strength and blending traditional fitness with unconventional training methods. That's why we created a variety of gear and training with an emphasis on unstable, shifting load.

Our gear is found all over the world from garage gyms to the front lines of the US Military, and is designed with one purpose: to cultivate peak performance for the functional athlete.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.testimonial_1: These are the best sandbags and fillers on the market. I've been using sandbags in my group classes for 8 years and have purchased from almost every company on the internet and nothing compares to Brute Force. Stop shopping around and buy these now.
settings.testimonial_2: I purchased this bag for a good friend of mine whose previous sandbag was leaking and falling apart. I’m a seamstress and he had been asking me to sew up various holes. He is very rough with his bag and he needs something durable and well made. After researching, I found Brute Force. Extremely well made!

settings.title: America Proud
settings.text: Brute Force is Veteran owned and operated and has a long history serving the US Military, Law Enforcement, Fire & EMS communities. Founded in 2009, Brute Force has grown to be the authority in Unstable Load and Odd Object Training.

settings.title: Come visit Our HQ
settings.text: Our USA-made gear is designed to be virtually indestructible and every product is tested and refined by some of the world’s toughest functional and tactical athletes at our 12,000 sq. ft. Brute Force Headquarters and Training center in Denver, CO.

settings.popup_text: Get 10% off your first order. Just enter your email address and check your inbox for an exclusive discount. Welcome to the CREW!

CUSTOMER SERVICE: 
Email: support@bruteforcetraining.com

settings.map_title: Brute Force Training Center and HQ

settings.title: What is the best filler material to use for my gear?
settings.text: We recommend using playground sand. You can find this at any hardware store. Other options would be rubber mulch or pea gravel.

settings.title: Does my order come with sand?
settings.text: Our bags ship unfilled so that you can fill them to the weight level you desire, as well as to avoid high shipping costs. We recommend you use play sand to fill the bags as it is typically the least dusty option and can be found at any Home Depot or Lowe's type store for about $3 per 50 lb bag. You can pour the sand directly into the inner fillers provided with our bags.

settings.title: How do you fill up the weighted vest to max it out?
settings.text: The load capacity of our weighted vest is 0 - 48 lbs depending on what you choose as a filler. We recommend using a combination of some fillers with steel shot and some fillers with sand depending on what weight you're trying to reach. Using sand only, each filler has a capacity of about 1.33 lbs, so filling all 12 fillers with sand will get your vest to 16 lbs. Using steel shot or copper bbs, each filler can be filled to a max of 4 lbs, so filling all 12 fillers with that can get the weight up to a max of about 48 lbs. Any sporting goods store like a Big 5 or Dick's Sporting Goods will have steel shot and BB options.

settings.title: Do you have a movement library?
settings.text: Please visit our YouTube channel to find all sorts of movements, SandWODs, and other training videos to help you get the most out of your sandbag.

settings.title: Can I order extra filler bags?
settings.text: We will always send you the recommended fillers for your bags with your order of the kit. However, if you'd like to replace yours or like to switch out different weights, we offer replacement fillers for sandbags here.

settings.title: How do I clean my bag?
settings.text: Find out everything you need to know about cleaning your bag here.

settings.title: What happened to the app?
settings.text: Our app is called BruteForce WOD. It's available in the Apple App Store and on Google Play. There is a (now defunct) app called URBruteForce that is not the right one. We’re currently working on redeveloping how we provide education, training, and daily SandWODs. If you prefer not to download the app, you can still enjoy the same great FREE daily SandWODS by signing up for our daily SandWOD email delivery.  All you have to do is submit your email address here and you will be added to the list. We are sending the email each night at 9pm. Get signed up so you can get back to work! #TrainAccordingly

settings.title: Do you have an ambassador program?
settings.text: Yes, we do! Applications are now open here and selections will happen in January.

settings.title: Shipping policy
settings.text: Our full Shipping Policy can be read here.

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text:
Brute Force ships gear all around the world.

Unfortunately, we can't predict how countries outside of the US will adjust for shipping, and in some cases additional duties, fees and taxes may apply. Due to the nature of these unforeseen fees, Brute Force is not responsible for these extra costs. We recommend that you do your due diligence in researching shipping fees for your location. International customers are responsible for any custom fees that may be associated with the order once it arrives at the border. Currently, we use UPS, DHL and FedEx as our international shipping partners.

settings.title: How do I ship my order back to you?
settings.text: Instructions for returning your item will be in your confirmation email.

settings.title: How long will my order take?
settings.text: It varies from state to state, but gear typically takes 3-7 days to arrive. You will receive a shipping confirmation with estimated arrival.

settings.title: Do you have a tactical discount? (Military, Law Enforcement, and Fire)
settings.text: Hi! We certainly do! Please visit our Tactical Discount Page and we will get you a special code. Thank you for your service!

settings.title: How can I check the status of my order?
settings.text: To follow up on the status, please reach out to support@bruteforcetraining.com. They’ll get you squared away!

settings.title: I have an issue with my gear, is it covered under a warranty?
settings.text: We’re sorry to see your gear is damaged. That definitely shouldn’t happen but  then again sometimes it does, which is why we stand behind our gear with our Brute Force Shield Warranty. You may submit a warranty and repair claim by visiting Our Warranty Page. A member of our customer service team will contact you with further instructions once your claim has been reviewed.

settings.title: How can I change my address?
settings.text: To formally request a change of address on your order, please contact support@bruteforcetraining.com and provide an order number along with the new shipping address.

settings.title: Can I return my item?
settings.text:
Brute Force Training accepts returns and exchanges on most products within 14 days of purchase. All returns will be issued in the form of store credit only.  If you received an incorrect or damaged item or have any questions about the returns & exchanges process, please email us at support@bruteforcetraining.com.

Brute Force Training gladly accepts returns and exchanges under the following conditions:

Product is unused and in its original condition. Product includes the original packaging and tags. Product return process is initiated to Brute Force Training within 14 days from the date you received it. Exchanges can be provided given the item for exchange is in stock, otherwise store credit will be issued.

settings.title: How do I submit a return or exchange?
settings.text:
Returns and Exchanges with Brute Force Training is easy.

Just follow these steps:

Submit Your Return

Visit Our Warranty Page and fill out the Warranty form. Include your Order # and reason for return or exchange. Allow 24-48 hours for your confirmation email with instructions and address of where to send your return or exchange.

Prepare Your Product for Return

Products returned without their original, undamaged packaging will not be accepted. For example, if you are returning a sandbag, don't duct tape the return label directly to the plastic packaging. Keep the Sandbag and/or fillers packaged as it came in its original packaging, and use a shipping box to ship back the product.

Return Your Product

Follow the instructions in your confirmation email.  

Receive Your Store Credit

You will receive a notification email as soon as your return is processed and we have applied your store credit to your transaction. Please allow up to 5 business days after your return has been delivered for your store credit to be processed and an email with details sent to be sent to you.

Receive Your Exchange

You will receive a notification email as soon as your exchange is processed and we have prepared the new item for shipment. Please allow up to 5 business days after your return has been delivered for your exchange to be processed and shipped.

Are there exceptions?

Yes, items marked as "Final Sale" are not eligible for return. These are generally items that for health or safety reasons, we are unable to take back. Final Sale items also may include select items that have been priced for final clearance and are not returnable. 

No returns or refunds will be accepted on discount items or items purchased using a promotional code.  If you're not sure, please contact us at support@bruteforcetraining.com.

No returns, refunds, or exchanges will be accepted on items not in their original condition.  All items ineligible for return are listed as such on the product details page. If you're not sure, please contact us at support@bruteforcetraining.com. 

If you receive your merchandise and it's defective, or if we happen to have sent you the wrong item or size, contact support@bruteforcetraining.com and we'll get you taken care of immediately.

settings.title: Think you have what it takes?
settings.text:
Our #Brutecrew Ambassador program is for those chosen few who truly walk the walk. This program is for those who use our gear to Train Accordingly for whatever life throws their way.

Our ambassadors are military and first responder professionals, elite athletes, or everyday fitness enthusiasts who never let excuses stop them from achieving their goals.

This team embodies our company mission to push the boundaries of mental and physical performance, and they inspire others to do the same.

settings.title: Ambassador Perks
settings.text:
Our ambassadors are part of an exclusive club in which membership does have its privileges. From exclusive sales to being featured on our social media platforms, we recognize those who go above and beyond. 

-Access to Ambassador exclusive sales, discounted gear, and early product releases
-Exclusive Ambassador swag pack shipped upon acceptance and then annually
-Recognition on social media - expand your reach!
-Chance to be featured on our website or in our ads
-Opportunities to test and evaluate new products - before they are released to the public

settings.title: Applications are Now Open!
settings.text: Apply now for selections in January 2022.

settings.title: We Stand with First Responders
settings.text:
Brute Force is honored to provide site-wide discounts to members of our community: Military & Armed Forces, Police (LEO), Fire, and Emergency Medical Personnel (EMS), Teachers and Educators.

This offer is eligible for:

-Current & former U.S. military
-Military spouses & dependents
-First responders including law enforcement, fire, and EMS
-Federal, state, and local government employees
-Teachers (K-12 and University teachers/staff)

settings.title: How it works:
settings.text:
-Click the button to claim your discount and you'll be asked to verify your affiliation with GovX ID.
-Verification is real-time and secure. If you already have a GovX ID account, just log in!
-After you verify, you'll receive a single-use discount code to apply at checkout. Be sure to copy your code.
-For future purchases, simply log in with your GovX ID to unlock a new discount code.There is a limit of one discount code per day.

settings.subtitle: BRUTE FORCE
settings.title: Classic SandBags
settings.text:
100% American Made, Brute Force Sandbags are without a doubt, the top selling, top performing and most used sandbag in the industry.

Found everywhere from the US Navy to garage gyms to CrossFit boxes—these sandbags are built for the toughest training on the planet and will humble most athletes right out of the gate.

settings.subtitle: New 2.0
settings.title: Brute Balls
settings.text:
The Brute Force Brute Balls™ are sand-filled, adjustable soft stone/atlas stone.

The ultimate in just lifting something heavy and awkward. Challenge yourself with unstable, unbalanced load squats and carries and take your load/unload game to the next level.

settings.subtitle: NO HANDLES
settings.title: BAREBONES
settings.text: Take your training to the next level with the strapless, Barebones series sandbags. Without a handle to grab, the challenge of every movement is different, only real brute force will get these bags off the ground.

settings.subtitle: SPECIAL EDITION
settings.title: GOLD & SILVER
settings.text: Rugged does not have to mean rough. Our special edition gold and silver straps put the bling in your bag, while still remaining strong enough for the toughest training.

settings.subtitle: AMERICAN MADE
settings.title: 76 SERIES
settings.text: Custom, hard wearing straps featuring the woven stars design offsets the sleek and unique style of the 76 series. With our alternate logo, the 76 Series is for those who work to be ready for anything.

settings.subtitle: Impressive
settings.title: Large image with text box
settings.text: Pair large text with a full-width image to draw attention to an important detail of your brand or product line.

settings.subtitle: Why Ben Loves
settings.title: Brute Force
settings.text: Unstable load training is the single most effective training concept when it comes to developing the neuromuscular and stability adaptations necessary to perform effectively in just about everything, from competitive to tactical and even recreational events. Brute Force Sandbags are my go to because the quality and durability are unmatched.

settings.subtitle: Special Offer for
settings.title: Ben Greenfield Listeners
settings.text:
Now, with this limited-time special offer, get a free Brute Force Training Plan (a $49 value!) with purchase of any sandbag or weighted vest, only for friends of Ben using code GREENFIELD. 

Designed by their world class trainers, each of 6-week training plans is tailored to deliver results. 

From the Basics plan, designed to guide your introduction to unstable load training, to the Operator Series, designed for military and first responders, Brute Force has a plan to help you reach your fitness goals.

settings.text_1: Every product is also tested and refined by some of the world’s toughest athletes our training center in Denver, CO.
settings.text_2: Our products use the strongest materials including, 1000D Mil-Spec Cordura, Ballistic Nylon and YKK Zippers.
settings.text_3: All our items are backed by an accompanying repair / replace warranty for peace of mind.

settings.subtitle: PEAK VERSATILITY
settings.title: The ATHLETE Sandbag
settings.text:
The Brute Force Athlete Sandbag is the ORIGINAL 8-Handle Sandbag that gives you access to over 300 movements with one piece of equipment.

• Black Athlete Sandbag
• 50 Lbs Pre-Filled Weight
• Adjustable in weight from 25lbs to 75lbs
• Functions best between 25lbs and 60lbs
• Meets all specs for Unstable Load Training

settings.subtitle: THE NEXT LEVEL
settings.title: KETTLEBELL
settings.text:
Take your training to the next level with the Brute Force Kettlebell Sandbag™ as part of our Level Up Package.

Weighing less than 1 pound when empty and up to 30 lbs when full, it's the ultimate training tool for people on the move or Deployable Fitness™ in a tactical environment. Roll it up, pack it up, and when you get to your destination, fill it up for an amazing workout.

settings.subtitle: STARTER KITS INCLUDE
settings.title: FREE 4-WEEK TRAINING PLAN
settings.text:
This 4 week program is designed to introduce you to U.L.0.0.™ Unstable Load, Odd Object training.

Upon completion, you will have established foundational movements, biomechanics, fundamental movement patterns, improved strength, increased endurance, and enhanced flexibility.

You will also become readily equipped to move forward into many of our other progressive Tactical, Functional, and/or Traditional athlete programs.

settings.subtitle: BRUTE FORCE
settings.title: TESTED BY HEROES
settings.text: Our products are used by military and emergency services to ensure that when the time comes, our heroes are ready for anything.

settings.subtitle: VETERAN OWNED
settings.title: MIKE & JEFF
settings.text: Veteran owned and USA-made, Mike Brown and Jeff Banman are leading Brute Force to the cutting edge of human performance.

settings.subtitle: COMMUNITY
settings.title: SANDWOD
settings.text: Join thousands of functional athletes who train daily with the toughest sandbags on the planet. Each day you will receive an email with a fun and challenging sand workout!

settings.testimonial_1: I tried a Brute Force sandbag at my local firehouse, and straight away could tell this was something different to all my other fitness gear. I love how different and challenging the workouts feel!
settings.testimonial_2: I wanted to get into a functional fitness program that I could do in my backyard and not take up too much space. As I am getting stronger, I can just dump more sand into the bag, and adjust it to exactly the right level of weight I want! x

settings.subtitle: Keeping it Simple
settings.title: Just Need the vest?
settings.text: If you've got the weight and your training plan covered, you can grab just the bag right here!

settings.title: APC Weighted vest 3.0
settings.subheading: Re-engineered and ready for the toughest challenges.

settings.title: 3.0 SPECification
settings.text_1:
Adjustable Fit Padded Shoulder Straps

Motion Enabling Weight System

Body Contouring Fit
settings.text_2:
Partner Drag / Carry Handle

Pull + Drag Loops on Front & Rear

10 Pockets for Weight Distribution
settings.text_3:
1000D Military Spec Cordura

Breathable Aerospace Mesh Panels

Double Stitched Construction

settings.subtitle: GROUNDBREAKING
settings.title: SEE WHAT MAKES OUR APC Filler System UNIQUE
settings.text:
Configurable from 2 LBS - 40 LBS+, the modular APC system can be pre-filled with our proprietary recycled steel blend or can be filled at home with sand, steel shot, dive weights, BBs or other dense, heavy material.

When filled with sand only, max weight is roughly 12 lbs. Each packet is easily removable to add or subtract weight quickly and easily, giving you max flexibility in the way you train.

settings.subtitle: EASY UPGRADE FROM VEST 2.0
settings.title: CARRY THE WEIGHT OVER
settings.text: The all-new APC weighted vest is backwards compatible with the Operator Weighted Vest 2.0 filler system so if you already own one of our vests, all you have to upgrade is the shell.

settings.title: FROM OUR BETA TESTERS
settings.testimonial_1: I was very surprised by this vest!! It has a great fit on the chest. Perfect for running, or any activity where you are moving around a lot. The elastic strap on the side is game changing!! Allows you to breathe but fits tight on the body. Can’t wait to wear it for the Murph!!
settings.testimonial_2: It doesn’t feel like a weight vest it just feels like a heavy tshirt. The vest stays tight to your body and doesn’t bang around during running, box jumps or even handstand push-ups. Even with the vest being tight it doesn’t constrict your breathing, this is because of the different elastic adjustments. Overall the best vest I have ever worn.

settings.subtitle: VERSION 3.0
settings.title: APC Weighted Vest
settings.text: Re-engineered and ready for the toughest challenges.

settings.title: Best Murph Ever Challenge by Brute Force
settings.text:
Every year on Memorial Day fitness enthusiasts everywhere join together to do the ultimate Hero WOD: Murph. Honoring LT Michael Murphy, the workout consists of a 1 mile run, 100 pull-ups, 200 push-ups, and 300 squats, followed by another 1 mile run. Participants are encouraged to wear body armor or a weighted vest.

This year, follow our brand new specifically designed 6-week training program, Tier 1, to crush your Best Murph Ever. This new program, designed by Beau Dorning, utilizes an incredibly effective combination of sandbag training and bodyweight conditioning (vest optional) to deliver maximum results. Challenge particpants will start the program as a group on Monday, April 18th and finish with Memorial Day Murph.

Choose from one of two packages below to get started.

settings.subtitle: TRAINING
settings.title: PATCH + PLAN
settings.text: If you already have a vest or plan to do your Murph at bodyweight, this is your ticket. At almost 50% off, you'll get access to our brand new Tier 1 training plan as well as a commemorative patch, all at a signficant discount. Particpants will start the plan as a group on April 18th.

settings.subtitle: FULL KIT
settings.title: Vest 3.0 + Patch + Plan
settings.text: Kit up with our brand new APC Weighted Vest 3.0 (*pre-order, ships in 2 weeks or less) and destroy your Murph PR in the most comfortable weighted vest on the planet. Save $45 when you buy the vest (including pre-filled recycled steel packets) and join the Challenge at the same time. Choose your vest color below.

settings.subtitle: BRUTE FORCE
settings.title: SUPPORTING OUR TROOPS
settings.text: We work closely with military and emergency services to develop our products and keep our heroes ready for anything. Because we are veterans ourselves, we also donate a percentage of proceeds each year to veteran and first responder charities.

settings.subtitle: BY BEAU DORNING
settings.title: TIER 1 TRAINING PLAN
settings.text: Crafted by elite Brute Force Trainer Beau Dorning, our brand new 6 week plan utilizes a combination of bodyweight, vest, and sandbag training to get you ready for Murph like never before.

settings.subtitle: NEW AND IMPROVED
settings.title: APC 3.0 WEIGHTED VEST
settings.text: Our goal was simple: Create the best weighted vest on the planet. Mission accomplished. Our Anti-Plate Carrier vest utilizes 10 flexible pockets filled with recycled steel to unlock freedom of movement like never before.

settings.subtitle: JOIN THE COMMUNITY
settings.title: Group Accountability
settings.text: Join our Facebook group and interact with our community of thousands of high-achievers just like you. Talk workouts, share victories and build accountability to make sure you stay on track.

settings.text_1: Every product is also tested and refined by some of the world’s toughest athletes our training center in Denver, CO.
settings.text_2: Our products use the strongest materials including, 1000D Mil-Spec Cordura, Ballistic Nylon and YKK Zippers.
settings.text_3: All our items are backed by an accompanying repair / replace warranty for peace of mind.

settings.subtitle: VETERAN OWNED
settings.title: MIKE & JEFF
settings.text: Veteran owned and USA-made, Mike Brown and Jeff Banman are leading Brute Force to the cutting edge of human performance.

settings.title: READY FOR THE NEXT EVOLUTION?
settings.subheading: DISCOVER WHAT IT MEANS TO BE SEAL-FIT & BUILT BY BRUTE FORCE

settings.title: OUR UNSTABLE LOAD SYSTEMS APPROACH
settings.text: Begin or advance your fitness journey with our new approach to Unstable Load Systems and Unstable Load Training...

settings.subtitle: Most Popular
settings.title: Basic Package
settings.text:
• Includes Best-Selling Black Athlete Sandbag
(50 Lbs Pre-Filled Weight—Train Immediately)

• Basic Level 4-Week Training Program FREE
($49.95 Value)

• Ongoing Community Challenges
(Daily Workout Emails & the Brute Force App)

settings.subtitle: For an Extra challenge
settings.title: Next Level Package
settings.text:
• Includes Best-Selling Black Athlete Sandbag
(50 Lbs Pre-Filled Weight—Train Immediately)
• PLUS the Brute Force Kettlebell Sandbag™
(30 Lbs Pre-Filled Weight—Train Immediately)
• Basic Level 4-Week Training Program FREE
($49.95 Value)

• Ongoing Community Challenges
(Daily Workout Emails & the Brute Force App)

settings.text_1: Every product is also tested and refined by some of the world’s toughest athletes our training center in Denver, CO.
settings.text_2: Our products use the strongest materials including, 1000D Mil-Spec Cordura, Ballistic Nylon and YKK Zippers.
settings.text_3: All our items are backed by an accompanying repair / replace warranty for peace of mind.

settings.subtitle: PEAK VERSATILITY
settings.title: The ATHLETE Sandbag
settings.text:
The Brute Force Athlete Sandbag is the ORIGINAL 8-Handle Sandbag that gives you access to over 300 movements with one piece of equipment.

• Black Athlete Sandbag
• 50 Lbs Pre-Filled Weight
• Adjustable in weight from 25lbs to 75lbs
• Functions best between 25lbs and 60lbs
• Meets all specs for Unstable Load Training

settings.subtitle: THE NEXT LEVEL
settings.title: KETTLEBELL
settings.text:
Take your training to the next level with the Brute Force Kettlebell Sandbag™ as part of our Level Up Package.

Weighing less than 1 pound when empty and up to 30 lbs when full, it's the ultimate training tool for people on the move or Deployable Fitness™ in a tactical environment. Roll it up, pack it up, and when you get to your destination, fill it up for an amazing workout.

settings.subtitle: STARTER KITS INCLUDE
settings.title: FREE 4-WEEK TRAINING PLAN
settings.text:
This 4 week program is designed to introduce you to U.L.0.0.™ Unstable Load, Odd Object training.

Upon completion, you will have established foundational movements, biomechanics, fundamental movement patterns, improved strength, increased endurance, and enhanced flexibility.

You will also become readily equipped to move forward into many of our other progressive Tactical, Functional, and/or Traditional athlete programs.

settings.subtitle: BRUTE FORCE
settings.title: TESTED BY HEROES
settings.text: Our products are used by military and emergency services to ensure that when the time comes, our heroes are ready for anything.

settings.subtitle: BUILT BY BRUTE FORCE
settings.title: VETERAN OWNED & OPERATED
settings.text: Veteran owned and USA-made, Jeff Banman and the team are leading Brute Force to the cutting edge of human performance.

settings.subtitle: COMMUNITY
settings.title: SANDWOD
settings.text: Join thousands of functional athletes who train daily with the toughest sandbags on the planet. Each day you will receive an email with a fun and challenging sand workout!

settings.testimonial_1: I tried a Brute Force sandbag at my local firehouse, and straight away could tell this was something different to all my other fitness gear. I love how different and challenging the workouts feel!
settings.testimonial_2: I wanted to get into a functional fitness program that I could do in my backyard and not take up too much space. As I am getting stronger, I can just dump more sand into the bag, and adjust it to exactly the right level of weight I want! x
